import './hero.css' import arrow_btn from "../../assets/arrow_btn.png" import pause_icon from '../../assets/pause_icon.png' import play_icon from '../../assets/play_icon.png' export const Hero = ({ heroData, setHeroCount, heroCount, setPlayStatus, playStatus }) => { return (

{heroData.text1}

{heroData.text2}

Explore the features

  • setHeroCount(0)} className={heroCount === 0 ? "hero-dot orange" : "hero-dot"}>
  • setHeroCount(1)} className={heroCount === 1 ? "hero-dot orange" : "hero-dot"}>
  • setHeroCount(2)} className={heroCount === 2 ? "hero-dot orange" : "hero-dot"}>
setPlayStatus(!playStatus)} src={playStatus ? pause_icon : play_icon} />

See the video

) } export default Hero;
